title: Stablecoin Ecosystem Holds Firm Despite Lackluster Activity
description: The stablecoin economy has remained relatively lackluster over the past 30 days, fluctuating slightly above or slightly below the $124 billion range. In the last 24 hours, the global trade volume for fiat and commodity-pegged tokens has reached $11.55 billion. Stablecoin Market Shows Resilience Amidst Volume Stagnation and Redemptions As of September 17, 2023, coingecko.com […]

title: Animoca Brands reveals plan to launch its Bitcoin-based token
description: In a significant development within the crypto gaming and metaverse investment space, Animoca Brands, a prominent player in this arena, has revealed plans through its subsidiary, Darewise Entertainment (also known as Life Beyond Studios), to launch an innovative metaverse ecosystem token on the Bitcoin network using the Ordinals protocol. title: Laliga North America teams up with GameOn to develop NFT fantasy games
description: Gaming startup GameOn has inked a new partnership with LaLiga North America to develop groundbreaking NFT-based fantasy games tailored for the passionate fanbase of the Spanish soccer league residing in the United States and Canada. Through this collaboration, fans will gain the ability to purchase packs of LaLiga players as NFTs, ushering in a new ... Read more

title: Hong Kong central bank warns crypto firms against misleading bank claims
description: The Hong Kong Monetary Authority has issued a stern warning to cryptocurrency-related firms that are misrepresenting themselves as banks or describing their products as deposits.
